text: Adelino da Rocha Vieira, known as Nito (born 5 July 1967) is a former Portuguese football player. He played 11 seasons and 285 games in the Primeira Liga for Belenenses, Rio Ave, Sporting Espinho and Tirsense. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Sporting Espinho on 23 August 1987 in a game against Marítimo. ==References== ==External links== Category:1967 births Category:People from Viana do Castelo District Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:S.C. title: Nito (footballer)
